scopecontent.p: Three manuscript volumes, presumably collected by Charles Sower, include Caspar Schwenkfeld's book of sermons, "Vom rechten Christ," (1709); "Ein schon christliches geistreiches Gebetbuch," a book of prayers that were perhaps gathered and edited by Caspar Schwenkfeld (1746); and "Miracula Wunderwerke" (1565) by Adam Reissner, portions of which are written in Hebrew , Greek, and Latin. This volume appears to be handwritten, but the title page states that it is printed ("bedruckt").
